title: Sketchbook Folio, "Putti in a Chariot with Dolphins and Swans", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center left: Della Robia Rimini mille quattro cento; at lower left 25 della Robia Rimini quattro cento. On verso: Rimini
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of five putti in and around chariot pulled by swans and dolphin. One putto rides swan, while another rides dolphin. Other three play musical instruments. Lower drawing of four dancing putti circling smoking altar upheld by statues of three female nudes on round plinth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Putti in a Chariot with Dolphins and Swans", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3495.
